channel.title: Add To Bluurrs
channel.description:
How can I add custom models to Bluurrs client. I added something but the drop/inv model is messed up but when I wield it, it works fine. The client im using does not have a models folder so I just made one and did add model #### and it said it worked. But something isin't right. It isin't the model or ints because it worked on a different client I added it to.
Thanks.

item.title: Add To Bluurrs
item.dc:creator: @sheeba sheeba
item.description:
@sheeba wrote:

Duhh lol. know what I did. I compiled after I added models and ints to folder. Then I logged on and said add model #### then just relogged. Never completely reset client.

Thanks for the reminder =p

Now do you know how to fix when I drop it it says

…item name
take item name

I want to get rid of the … because its annoying and it does nothing.

Read full topic

item.title: Add To Bluurrs
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Did you reboot the client? (dont call me an idiot because most people forget to). If not try “add models ####”. If not, check again and make sure you put in the right model numbers.

Read full topic
